description: Gift idea tracker and birthday reminder with cloud sync. Save gift ideas for people year-round, track what you've given, set budget limits, and get timely reminders before occasions.
target_user: Thoughtful gift-givers who want to remember ideas throughout the year and never miss important dates
core_loop: Add person with important dates (birthday, anniversary)
Capture gift ideas whenever inspiration strikes
Mark gifts as purchased with spend tracking
Review gift history before next occasion
